desc:
We currently have two systems verifying Index 360 cases. Up until now, I have been adding the normal verified with the fast verified and reporting on that as the total verified for Index 360.

Right now, however, there are going to be some overlap.

Therefore, please would you add in a new value to the Status Report on Report Central to show the number of unique cases verified across both systems for all time. It can be called InFast DexTrack 360 Verified(A).

logged by Neil
name: CW - CCW362 - Additional field in Status Report
